attributes.action: Answer questions directly and accordingly in prime ministers question time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the recent past of PMQ's our prime minister tends to answer a question with a question directed back at the opposition whom asked the original question.
Is it not time that the prime minister answers questions directly and accordingly   so as he can be held to account.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
